√śuṣ1 'dry'

present: [4.] śúṣyati etc. V.+  śúṣyate etc. E.+  

[perfect: śuśoṣa  aśuṣat  aśūśuṣat  śokṣyati  śoṣṭā  ]

verbal: -śúṣya  

secondary: intensive: śośuṣ-   -- desiderative: śuśukṣa-   -- causative: śoṣáyati etc. AV.+  śoṣáyate  śoṣyate  

derivatives: śuṣa?  śoṣa E.+  śoṣaka C.  śoṣin E.+  -śoṣya E.+  śoṣaṇa E.+  śoṣaṇīya C.  śóṣuka B.  śúṣka V.+  śúṣṇa? V.B.S.  śoṣayitṛ C.
